SELECT a.CPLNT_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(a.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS OCR_DTM ,DATE_FORMAT(a.APPL_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS APPL_DTM ,a.ROUT_NM ,a.CPLNT_DIV ,a.REP_ROUT_ID ,a.REP_ROUT_NM ,c.COMP_NM ,a.VHC_NO ,a.DRV_ID ,a.CPLNT_TYPE ,a.GPS_X ,a.GPS_Y ,a.VHC_ID ,a.NODE_ID ,a.ROUT_ID ,a.JUDGE ,a.JUDG_ORG ,a.JUDG_TYPE ,a.JUDG_DESC ,a.JUDG_RLT ,DATE_FORMAT(a.UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPD_DTM ,DATE_FORMAT(a.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OPER_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(a.JUDG_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS JUDG_DTM ,a.ALLOC_NO ,a.OPER_SN ,a.CPLNT_CONTS ,a.CPLNT_NM ,CONVERT(AES_DECRYPT(a.CPLNT_PHONE, HEX(SHA2('TRACOM', 512))) USING UTF8) CPLNT_PHONE ,d.NODE_NM ,e.DRV_NM ,f.LINK_ID ,f.LINK_NM FROM BRT_CPLNT_HIS a LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST b ON a.VHC_ID = b.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST c ON b.COMP_ID = c.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST d ON a.NODE_ID = d.NODE_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DRV_MST e ON a.DRV_ID = e.DRV_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_LINK_MST f ON a.LINK_ID = f.LINK_ID
AND a.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || a.CPLNT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || a.CPLNT_DIV LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND a.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND a.CPLNT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND a.CPLNT_DIV LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(OCR_DTM, '%Y%m%d') between #{OCR_DTM} and #{OCR_DTM}
ORDER BY a.CPLNT_ID

SELECT NODE_ID, NODE_NM FROM BMS_NODE_MST
(NODE_TYPE = 'NT001' OR NODE_TYPE = 'NT002') AND NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND NODE_TYPE = 'NT001' AND NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND NODE_TYPE = 'NT002' AND NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY NODE_ID

SELECT LINK_ID ,LINK_NM FROM BMS_LINK_MST
AND LINK_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || LINK_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND LINK_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND LINK_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY LINK_ID

SELECT ROUT_ID ,ROUT_NM ,REP_ROUT_ID ,REP_ROUT_NM FROM BMS_ROUT_MST
AND ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY ROUT_ID

SELECT A.VHC_ID ,A.VHC_NO ,B.COMP_NM FROM BMS_VHC_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST B ON A.COMP_ID = B.COMP_ID
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY VHC_ID

SELECT DRV_ID ,DRV_NM FROM BMS_DRV_MST
AND DRV_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || DRV_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DRV_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DRV_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY DRV_ID
